info.title: Information
info.info_body:
This tool aims to contribute to Sweden's climate transition.

In the tool, national scenarios, also called quantitative roadmaps, can be broken down to regional and local levels and an action plan can be created.

The action plan is built up by actions which relate to a specific goal and the goals together make up the entire roadmap.

Users can be inspired by each other's actions, creating a common action database for Sweden.

At the local level, different actors can also collaborate on actions.

verify.title: Verify your email
verify.description: An email has been sent to your email address. Verify your email by following the instructions in the email.
verify.troubleshooting_description: Check your spam folder or fill in your email address below and click the button to receive a new email.

verify_verify.title: Verify your email
verify_verify.description: Verify your email by clicking the button below.

password.description: Forgot your password? Enter your email here and we will send an email with instructions to reset your password.

password_reset.description: Enter your new password below and submit to update your password.

roadmap_edit.title: Edit $t(common:roadmap_version_one)
roadmap_edit.are_you_in_the_right_place: Did you mean to edit the entire $t(common:meta_roadmap_definite)? In that case, <Link>go here</Link> to edit the metadata.

goal_create.title: Create new $t(common:goal_one)
goal_create.bad_roadmap:
Could not find or do not have access to the roadmap version in the link.

Use the dropdown menu to select a roadmap version to create goals under.

action_create.title: Create new $t(common:action_one)
action_create.bad_goal: Could not find or do not have access to the $t(common:goal_one) in the link.
action_create.bad_roadmap:
Could not find or do not have access to the $t(common:roadmap_version_one) in the link.
Use the dropdown menu to select a $t(common:roadmap_version_one).

goal.update_needed: Update your $t(common:goal_one) to get the latest information.
goal.scale_notice: All values in the $t(common:goal_definite_one) use the following scale: "{{scale}}"
goal.scale_deprecation_warning: Please bake the scale into the value or unit; scales will be removed in the future

effect_create.title: Create new $t(common:effect_one)

effect_create.bad_goal: Could not find or do not have access to the $t(common:goal_one) in the link. Please select a new one in the form below.
